dialog.text: Hi %you.first_name%, are you a first year?

joins.text: Great to meet you, I'm in first year.

dialog.text: I am really excited about this course, can't wait to learn how to build my own games.  Are you going to use your webcam for team meetings?

joins.text: I am not sure yet either.

dialog.text: Am stuck in my bedroom in my tiny flat and its a tip!  Anyway, got to go now.  Will catch up with you later in the week!
